Class NoteWithFullInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cf.leduyquang753.nbsapi.NoteWithFullInfo

  • public class NoteWithFullInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A note that has full information can be written into NBS files.
    Author:
    Le Duy Quang

        The type of note which contains full information.
        Parameters:
        instrument - The note's instrument.
        pitch - The note's pitch.
        layer - The layer number of the note.
        location - The song tick where the note is on.
